section.54: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Another chain of transmitters reports the like of the previous two chains. Abu Sariha reported:We were discussing (the Last Hour) that Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) looked towards us. The rest of the hadith is the same and the tenth (sign) was the descent of Jesus Christ son of Mary, and Shu'ba said: 'Abd al-'Aziz did not trace it directly to Allah's Apostle (ﷺ)
